markdown.markdown:
Iâ€™m an assistant professor of political science at [The University of California, Davis](https://ps.ucdavis.edu/) where I [research](/publications.html) and [teach](/teaching.thml) on security, development, and research methods. In my research I often work with governments, international donors, and their implementing partners to improve the design and evaluation of development programming around the world. I was born in Cali, Colombia, grew up in Cali/South Florida, and have lived in Texas, North Carolina, South Carolina, and now California. ### Education

`r fontawesome::fa("graduation-cap", fill = "#022851", a11y = "sem")` **PhD in Political Science, 2019** | Duke University

`r fontawesome::fa("graduation-cap", fill = "#022851", a11y = "sem")` **MA in Political Science, 2016** | Duke University

`r fontawesome::fa("graduation-cap", fill = "#022851", a11y = "sem")` **BA in Political Science, 2013** | University of Florida

### Research interests Armed conflict | Development | Security | Latin America
